name: Outlines
notes: Structured generation for LLMs - guarantees JSON/regex/grammar compliance during generation. Widely adopted by NVIDIA/Cohere/HuggingFace.

name: Guidance
notes: Efficient programming paradigm for steering LLMs with Python-like syntax. Enables interleaved control and generation with CFG constraints.

name: DSPy
notes: Programming rather than prompting framework. Compositional Python code with algorithms for optimizing prompts and weights.

name: LMQL
notes: Programming language for LLMs. Superset of Python with constraint-guided generation, advanced decoding algorithms.

name: Instructor
notes: Structured outputs for LLMs built on Pydantic. Simple interface for reliable JSON extraction with validation, retries, streaming.

name: Letta
notes: Stateful agents with virtual memory management (formerly MemGPT). LLM OS with memory hierarchy, context engineering, multi-agent shared memory.

name: BAML
notes: Schema engineering DSL for AI workflows. SAP algorithm, model switching, streaming UIs, treats prompts as typed functions.

name: TypeChat
notes: Natural language interfaces using types from Microsoft. Schema engineering over prompt engineering with discriminated unions.

name: GraphRAG
notes: Knowledge graph memory structures for LLMs from Microsoft Research. Data pipeline for extracting structured data from unstructured text.
